channel.title: BBC News - World
channel.description: The latest stories from the World section of the BBC News website.

item.title: Ukraine crisis: Russia orders troops into separatist regions
item.description: President Putin orders forces into two rebel-held areas of eastern Ukraine, after recognising them as independent.

item.title: Canada protests: Police clear Ottawa bridge as crackdown continues
item.description: Police in Canada make dozens of arrests as they continue efforts to end protests against Covid restrictions.
